opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Allen, Appellant, v. Kindervater.
Argued October 7, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Robert L. Walker, with him Thomas, Shafer, Walker, Dornhaffer & Swick, for appellant.
Stuart A. Culbertson, for appellee.
November 12, 1968:
